participant_1.background:
School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.
i like watching tv and movies.
Music calms my soul.
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.

participant_2.background:
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
My morning routine starts with taking my allergy medication so that I can tolerate being around my neighbors' cats.
drawing in traditional style is my pasion.
I love to eat at the local diner because it is close to my house and the food is always good.
i am a professional bowler.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?
I'm doing alright, just looking forward to the weekend.
What do you have planned for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going bowling.
That sounds like fun! I'm a professional bowler myself.
Really? That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to bowl.
It's not too hard to learn, but it takes a lot of practice to get good.
I'm sure I'll get the hang of it eventually.
I'm sure you will. Just remember to keep your arm straight and follow through with your swing.
No problem! Have fun bowling this weekend!
